Review Title: Safe choice close to the airport
Review Text: Joygate hotel and suites is close to the airport in Lagos. This is a modern hotel with air conditioning, comfortable beds and an outdoor pool.  The restaurant is nothing special. We tried both breakfast and dinner - rather uninspiring.  The hotel can arrange airport pickup and also excursions with heavily armed officers as protection, which is recommended if you are white.  Free Wi-Fi. Friendly staff. Slow service. They manage to find strange extras like “the breakfast is only included for one person in a double room”. Annoying.  The hotel is a safe choice in Lagos.

Travelling back to the UK, I stayed here for a few hours as my flight was a late night flight. Hotel is as impressive on the outside as it is in the inside. Staff where alert, friendly and professional. Hotel is modern and has the latest and up to date technology. But I must say the staff where absolutely class, and are a credit to the hotel.   The hotel is a little bit out of the way, very close to the airport.

Joygate hotel is indeed a home away from home! Strategically located along airport road, in a serene environment with friendly and dedicated staff. The rooms, roof top bar, and swimming pool  is a wonderful sight to behold. Wont forget the IPTV experience where i had the experience of chatting with my friends on Facebook via the 47 inches television in my room, also was able to place my order right from my television set. I will surely visit Joygate again when next in Nigeria.
Room Tips: The best hotel along the airport road in Nigeria.
